name: Counter Climb
description:
Counter Climb is a tile-based puzzler where the player controls a number. In each level, the player must make this number go up in order to win.

This game was made for the UMass Amherst Game Dev club's 2-week summer 2020 game jam, with the theme "NUMBER GO UP". Not only was this my first game jam, but this is also my first game! Hope you like it, I had a lot of fun both brainstorming and developing it.
